./bp_me/src/v/wormhole/bp_me_lce_id_to_cord.v Cov: 97.3% 

   1: 
   2: // TODO: Configure to handle network configurations more flexibly
   3: module bp_me_lce_id_to_cord
   4:  import bp_common_pkg::*;
   5:  import bp_common_aviary_pkg::*;
   6:  #(parameter bp_cfg_e cfg_p = e_bp_inv_cfg
   7:    `declare_bp_proc_params(cfg_p)
   8: 
   9:    , localparam lce_id_width_lp = `BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(num_lce_p)
  10:    )
  11:   (input [lce_id_width_lp-1:0]         lce_id_i
  12:    , output [coh_noc_cord_width_p-1:0] lce_cord_o
  13:    , output [coh_noc_cid_width_p-1:0]  lce_cid_o
  14:    );
  15: 
  16:   if (coh_noc_dims_p > 0)
  17:     begin : x_cord
  18:       assign lce_cord_o[0+:coh_noc_x_cord_width_p] = 
  19:         (lce_id_i >> 1'b1) % lce_id_width_lp'(coh_noc_x_dim_p);
  20:     end
  21:   if (coh_noc_dims_p > 1)
  22:     begin : y_cord
  23:       assign lce_cord_o[coh_noc_x_cord_width_p+:coh_noc_y_cord_width_p] = 
  24:         (lce_id_i >> 1'b1) / lce_id_width_lp'(coh_noc_x_dim_p);
  25:     end
  26:       assign lce_cid_o = coh_noc_cid_width_p'(lce_id_i[0]);
  27: 
  28: endmodule
  29: 
  30:
